name: Unattractive Appearance
text:
You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose:
Exhaust your alter-ego → remove Unattractive Appearance from the game.
Choose and discard 1 [[attack ]]event from your hand. Discard this obligation.

name: Here, There Be Dragon
text: "No place on Earth will give you safety, mortal, when FIN FANG FOOM strikes!" When Revealed: Each player must place threat here equal to the total number of [[attack ]]events in their hand. [crisis]

name: Fin Fang Foom
text: Double the amount of damage this minion takes from [[attack ]]events. (Beta Ray Bill's nemesis minion.) “I come from a shape-changing cosmic race known as the Makluan... some call Space Dragons!”

name: Against All Odds
text: When Revealed: Place 1 threat on the main scheme for each villain and [[elite]] minion in play. If there are no [[elite]] minions in play, this card gains surge.

name: Strange Tales
text: When Revealed: Choose a side scheme in the encounter deck discard pile and reveal it. If no side scheme was revealed this way, this card gains surge.

name: Human Snack
text: Surge. When Revealed: Heal all damage from Fin Fang Foom. "Human beings are mostly water. Their tissues and luids retain flavors and and other residues from their food. Their bones have a brittle quality. Their skin is warm and pliant"
